EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Pivotal/EMA_Data Analytics in Cloud_Q216.Reminder 4-26-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder for Analytics in the Cloud: Getting The Most Out Of Analytics Deployments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You are registered for today's webinar, Data Analytics in the Cloud with Lyndsay Wise, Research Director of Business Intelligence at EMA and Jeff Kelly, Technology Evangelist at Pivotal Software.
Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, April 26, 2016 Time: 11:00AM PDT (San Francisco, CA)
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1157332/38CA12B21FFA6AE1002BBD37F1E16FAC]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
